intro.p: A recent poll by Quinnipiac University wanted to know how confident Americans are about whether or not their state elected officials will protect their right to vote. The pollsters spoke to {{sample}} U.S. adults from January 7th - 10th, 2022. Of the poll participants, {{result}}% were {{outcome}}.

content.p: What is the population that this study is trying to get information about?
What is the variable used for this study?

outtro.p: The variable is do they feel state elected officials will protect their right to vote.

content.p: What type of variable is the variable in question 3?
What is the sample statistic for this study?

outtro.p: The sample statistic is {{result}}% of those polled, were {{outcome}}

content.p: What is the parameter of interest for this study? (the population parameter they are trying to gether information about)

outtro.p: The parameter of interest is what percentage of Americans are {{outcome}}.
